Battera::

She looked around quickly and spoke to him in a soft tone. "Look, you 
are right. I am trying to get this Nightlight back for you. But I 
can't be seen with you. Please, go and let me try to save this bot 
for you. If I don't make it, you will still be functioning to 
complete the rescue. Go now, let the others know that I am still 
trying and that I will not give up untill the last bit of energy 
leaves my spark."  With that, she looked to the sky and started to 
take off.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He shakes his head.  "Don't recognize me with my new 
coloration?  Oh 
> well.  I remember you.  You're the bot that saved Kup from the 
paralytic gas.  
> I doubt you have any real reason for being here except to rescue 
Nightlight.  
> Now then, if, when you return to the Maximals as Maxima ordered you 
could tell 
> Rodimus that Aerotaur will watch over his beloved until she decides 
to 
> return, I would be much obliged."  He transforms to his robot form 
and looks her 
> straight in the eye.  "However if she decides not to return I will 
protect that 
> decision, even from him."
